response.original_title: The Marvels XXX: A Porn Parody
response.overview: Cosplaygrounds fifth original production takes aim at the Marvel Cinematic Universe with The Marvels XXX: A Porn Parody (2024)! Blake Blossom steps into spandex to tackle the role of Captain Marvel, who has to learn to work together with both Monica Rambeau (Ana Foxxx), aka Photon, and Kamala Khan (Reyna Belle), aka Ms. Marvel! The only catch is that this time, their mission is to please one another rather than take down some intergalactic threat! Blake, Ana, and Reyna all bring their A-game to this incredible lesbian threesome scene that you can only find right here at Cosplayground!
response.title: The Marvels XXX: A Porn Parody
